title: Client freezing in champ select with accept/decline match overlay stuck
body: Lost first game of promo due to a client bug that prevents me from selecting/banning a champion. Have performed a repair and still have the issue. Am forced to close the client before I can do anything afterwards. Does anyone have a fix?

replies.body:
on the upside you can at least let your team know that you cant do squat while you wait for the timer to time out
i want my LP back
just hit tab to cycle through until you hit chat

https://imgur.com/a/rUsXtZm
Just happned right now to me. So annoying

1. Update your GPU drivers. (Outdated drivers can cause all sorts of weird errors).
2. Try an ethernet connection if applicable/possible. (It's possible something is interfering with your connection)
2. Try reinstalling the game with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends). (This should solve any corrupt files or bad installs that a client repair can't reach)
3. Submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new (They'll be able to help you if nothing else works)
